entry.def: You can use madly to indicate that one person loves another a great deal.

example.ex: She has fallen madly in love with him...
She was devoted to him, but she no longer loved him madly.

entry.def: You can use madly in front of an adjective in order to emphasize the quality expressed by the adjective.
